== Date, Time and Place ==
The Pacific Northwest Team meetings are scheduled monthly.  If you would like to have a meeting sooner then the next scheduled time, please contact the team via the mailing list ''(ubuntu-us-pnw@lists.ubuntu.com)''.

The next meeting will be on <nowiki>[[http://www.timeanddate.com/worldclock/fixedtime.html?month=5&day=8&year=2008&hour=18&min=0&sec=0&p1=234|8 May 2008, 18:00 PST]]</nowiki> at '''''#ubuntu-pnw''''', ''irc.freenode.net''.

Team meetings are open to anyone interested in current team activities.  All team members are encouraged to attend.  If you would like to discuss something that is not shown on the agenda please feel free to add it.

== Agenda ==
* Upcoming Events
* Team projects
** Open
** OR loco team update
** WA loco team update

** <nowiki>[[http://wiki.ubuntu.com/PNWTeam/projects/LFNW2008|LinuxFest Northwest 2008]]</nowiki> recap

* Other
